comments.author: AliDeep
comments.body: What are your advantages before other e-mail distribution cmc services?

comments.author: Backed_Finance
comments.body: A lot depends not only how big is your  CMC database for Email distribution but also the quality of database, how old it is and whom it belong. It is important to understand how it is useful this database.

comments.author: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket
comments.body: HelloMass emailing is not an expensive and effective source of traffic and a way to attract investors.Are you interested in getting targeted leads? We can make an email newsletter on a database of 8.6 million emails of potential crypto investors.Available Email Databases:•CoinMarketCap: 3.1 million emails•Top Crypto Exchanges: more than 4,6 M emails• Bitcointalk forum: 543,690  emails addresses •Crypto Funds Database (520+ funds)•10,000 Email addresses of regular crypto investors of 2019-2022•More than 1,000,000 Email addresses of US crypto traders and ICO investors•Crypto Investor Email database (Brazil only): 260,000+ emails•300,000 Telegram usernames of regular crypto investors•Bounty Hunters Email Database: 104,000 people•Asian Venture Fund Database (100+ funds, 40 angels)•Venture Fund Database: 500+ funds•Hedge Fund Investments Database (5,200 investment companies)•650,000+ emails from several crypto forums and exchangesTo find out prices for email newsletters and the cost of databases, please contact:SUPPORT EMAIL: icodatabases@gmail.comSUPPORT TELEGRAM: https://t.me/ICODATABASES
